text: Tabe ki apani laksya karechena take, ye tara kheyala-khusike nija ilahâ€Œ baniye niyeche? Ara tara kache jnana asara para allaha take bibhranta karechena [1] ebam tini tara kana o hrdaye mohara kare diyechena. Ara tini tara cokhera upara rekhechena abarana. Ata'eba, allahara pare ke take hedayeta dibe? Tabu ki tomara upadesa grahana karabe na
